mapper.update:
update tps_quotation_audit_set
type = null, flowid = null, overflow_down = null, overflow_up = null, audit_user = null, assignuser = null, audit_rule = null, create_user = null, create_time = null, active = null, active_user = null, active_time = null, active_memo = null,
and lineid = #{lineid} and lineid =
mapper.delete: delete from tps_quotation_audit_set where 1=1 and lineid = #{lineid}

delete from tps_quotation_audit_set where lineid in
#{entity.lineid}
mapper.insert:
insert into tps_quotation_audit_set (type,flowid,overflow_down,overflow_up,audit_user,assignuser,audit_rule,create_user,create_time,active,active_user,active_time,active_memo) values
( #{entity.type,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.flowid,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.overflowDown,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.overflowUp,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.auditUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.assignuser,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.auditRule,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.createUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{entity.active,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.activeUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.activeTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{entity.activeMemo,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT a1.flowid,a1.audit_user FROM ( SELECT flowid, audit_user AS audit_user FROM tps_quotation_audit_set WHERE tps_quotation_audit_set.TYPE = #{type} AND flowid >#{flowid} AND flowid <= (SELECT MAX(flowid) FROM tps_quotation_audit_set WHERE #{price} > tps_quotation_audit_set.overflow_down AND #{price} <= tps_quotation_audit_set.overflow_up AND tps_quotation_audit_set.type = #{type}) ORDER BY flowid ) a1 LIMIT 0,1
